title: Cabinet Office's Women In Digital Network - Be The Change You Want to See!

content.text: Welcome to the Cabinet Office Women in Digital Network.We are an open, friendly and dedicated network supporting and empowering women to reach their full potential currently working or aspiring to be in a digital and technology role.
We have prioritised  4 work streams that we are most passionate about.

We welcome allies who can use their influence to promote greater diversity and inclusion. By holding others to account by challenging discrimination and inequality and becoming diverse and inclusive we can create an organisation that is reflective of the society we are serving.

Breaking down the barriers on gender bias is everyone’s responsibility. By becoming aware of unconscious bias and raising awareness women can become more confident about applying roles. Women would only apply when they could demonstrate most of what was in the job description. By reaching out, mentoring and supporting and encouraging it has given women the confidence to apply for positions they would not normally consider.
